Introduction
This topic contains information about school attendance at Federal government expense, including
preclusion of benefits for children attending school at Federal expense
verification requirements for school attendance at Federal expense
handling school breaks affected by attendance at Federal expense
service academies
, and
service academy preparatory schools
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Benefit Entitlement for School Children
citation: Part VII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
